data.text: @jengleruk It’s so weird. I know people that went and got tested at the first sign of not feeling “quite right” for the past 2 years. I think they wanted the drama of testing positive. I mean, just stay home and chill if you don’t feel well 🤦🏼‍♀️
@jengleruk All that testing on board cruise ships. All fully vaccinated. But still seeing outbreaks of Covid? It’s almost as if the vaccines don’t do what they are meant to.
@jengleruk That cruise sounds horrible. Cruises are definitely off my list of things to do if they are going to be like that.
